definitions.definition: Any substance which can flow with relative ease , tends to assume the shape of its container , and obeys Bernoulli's principle ; a liquid , gas or plasma .
A liquid ( as opposed to a solid or gas ) .

definitions.label_groups: specifically , medicine , colloquial , typically in the plural

main_definition: Any substance which can flow with relative ease , tends to assume the shape of its container , and obeys Bernoulli's principle ; a liquid , gas or plasma .
secondary_definitions: A liquid ( as opposed to a solid or gas ) .
( specifically , medicine , colloquial , typically in the plural ) Intravenous fluids.
